# PR Checklist

## Scope
- [ ] Scope is small and reversible
- [ ] No unrelated refactors

## Risk Level
- [ ] Routine
- [ ] Risky (SW / checkout / images / critical CSS)

## Required Checks (Risky Only)
- [ ] SW offline test
- [ ] Product freshness test
- [ ] Checkout fallback test (popup blocked)
- [ ] CLS sanity check (visual)

## Rollback Plan (Required if Risky)
- Plan:

## Evidence (optional)
- Lighthouse report link:
- Screenshots (if visual changes):
